message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,250,000. It's a fantastic deal, considering the value it holds for you. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While $1,100,000 is a good offer, it's a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000 to make this deal work. It's a fair price considering the value you'll get from the product.

I understand that you're willing to come down to $1,150,000, but I'm still not comfortable with that price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1,075,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
